title: Long Distance Communicator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Set up a telephone wire at a player's house.
- Set up a pipe between two people's houses.
- Give a player a letter.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A telephone wire will allow players to anonymously send messages to all other players with a wire, though being unable to differentiate each other.
- Players with a pipe may open a private chat with the other person for one phase by using it during the phase before, but only if both players use it at the same time. It has a one day cooldown.
- Writing a letter allows a player to send any body of text to another player at the end of the next night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to the end of the game.

desc:
Post 3240
*Don't worry about the maintenance costs.*
